mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY RNUM DESC) ROW_NUM, RNUM, FAQ_NUM, FAQ_CATEGORY, FAQ_TITLE, FAQ_CONTENT FROM( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY FAQ_NUM DESC) RNUM, FAQ_NUM, FAQ_CATEGORY, FAQ_TITLE, FAQ_CONTENT FROM FAQ )ORDER BY ROW_NUM DESC
